name: SuperFran (SAE Amsterdam)
description:
Superfran 

2.5D platformer 

You play as Superfran, a funny young girl who always ends up in fantastic adventures. She is here to help all other kids and make difficult subjects easy to discuss. This time Superfran has fallen into a cave and she lost a few of her personal belongings. Can you help Superfran to find all her items back and lead her to the end of the cave.

 ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

SAE Amsterdam Student project 2019 

  • 3 months time 
  • 3 developers 
  • 2 audio designers 
  • Based on original IP from Francien de Jong 

https://twitter.com/studiosuperfran
